comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47D serial 42-76234 had been MAJ Robert S. Johnson's last assigned aircraft with the 61st Fighter Squadron, 56th FG at Halesworth. After Johnson rotated home the 56th was moved to Boxted; it was damaged in this taxi accident on 24 July 1944 with LT William R. Hudson at the controls.

comment.author: 87280338@N05
comment._content: I KNEW I had seen a picture of this airplane taken long after Bob had relenquished it.
